name: java-checkstyle
description: Uses CheckStyle (8.24) (https://checkstyle.sourceforge.io/cmdline.html) to check the styling of your java files.  Option to pass in a config file, defaults to google_check.xml.
author: Lindsay-Needs-Sleep

scripts.eslint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint src && node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint test && node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint bin
